# Racim ZATI - Student Developer Portfolio

## About
Racim ZENATI is a Student Developer and Creative Coder based in Grenoble, France. He specializes in IA Development..


## Projects
- **Portfolio**: This website, showcasing his work and skills.
- **Various Open Source Experiments**: Available on GitHub.

## Contact
- **Email**: Racimzenati.pro@gmail.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/racimzz
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/racim-zenati

## Content Structure
- `/`: Main landing page with Hero, About, Skills, Experience, Projects, and Contact sections.
- `/resume`: Direct link to view/download resume.
